description: Highly durable and technically precise, the lightweight Ribelle Run is the ideal choice for short to medium distance training and racing in rugged, rocky terrain. A climbing inspired rand and a precision fit make this the ultimate trail technician for forays into the alpine. Underfoot, the SuperGum outsole is both sticky and durable, providing all the confidence you need to handle whatever mountain mission you dream up.
name: Scarpa Ribelle Run - Mens
